-But it's no match for real magic. -[chimes jingle]
translation.fr: Ça ne rivalise pas avec de la vraie magie.

translation.en: -[glove whirs] -Give it up, Bels.
[Belsnickel] Not a chance.
The only thing you ever cared about was your stupid holiday.
That stupid holiday
makes billions of people feel love and happiness.
translation.fr: procure de la joie et de l'amour à des milliards de gens.

translation.en: Well, I'm about to change all of that.
Change, ha!
You couldn't handle any of the little changes
translation.fr: Tu ne supportais pas le moindre changement ici,

translation.en: that were going on around here, so you ran away.
translation.fr: Tu ne supportais pas le moindre changement ici, alors tu t'es enfui.

translation.en: Because you spend every hour of every year getting ready for one lousy day.
translation.fr: Car tu passes chaque heure de l'année à préparer ce jour stupide.

translation.en: A day that brings joy to children all over the world,
translation.fr: Un jour qui procure de la joie à tous les enfants

translation.en: and that will never change.
Belsnickel, stop!
[Mrs. Claus] Nick!
-[Santa exhales] -Belsnickel, what have you done?
This is… [gasps]
This is bad.
Without the star,
the North Pole, the village, Christmas itself is doomed!
translation.fr: le Pôle Nord, le village et Noël sont fichus !

translation.en: Like, for this year?
Like, forever.
You're right. This is bad.
But we can't let that happen.
Christmas must endure.
translation.fr: Le monde a besoin de Noël !

translation.en: [grunts] To the stables.
[in English] Hugg, don't you--
-Elf Bane. -Oh, dear!
[grunts] What's going on?
The elves have been poisoned by Elf Bane.
translation.fr: La Lutinite a empoisonné les lutins.

translation.en: It drives them insane. They become reckless, dangerous maniacs.
translation.fr: Ça les rend fous. Ils deviennent cinglés et imprudents.

translation.en: Belsnickel spiked the cannons!
-[in English] Inside! -Come, let's-- All right.
-[Kate] Go, Jack. -[Mrs. Claus] Okay.
[grunts] Here. Come on. Hurry up.
-[panting] Okay. -[reindeer grunting]
-[Mrs. Claus sighs] -Oh, Dash.
Can you heal her?
I'll try my best.
I also have to find a cure for Elf Bane.
translation.fr: Je dois les guérir de la Lutinite.

translation.en: -And I need to get to Turkey. -Turkey?
translation.fr: Et je dois aller en Turquie. En Turquie ?

translation.en: I need to find Hakan and the Forest Elves.
translation.fr: Pour trouver Hakan et les Lutins de la Forêt.

translation.en: They're the ones that can build a new star for me to reignite.
translation.fr: Ils m'aideront à créer une nouvelle étoile.

translation.en: But, Nick, you've never flown with only seven reindeer.
translation.fr: Tu n'as jamais volé avec seulement sept rennes.

translation.en: I know, I know. And you can't work on Dasher
translation.fr: Mais tu ne peux pas soigner Tornade

translation.en: and find a cure for Elf Bane by yourself.
translation.fr: et trouver un remède à la Lutinite seule.

translation.en: Jack will help me.
He will?
Should I stay here, too?
No, no, I need you to come with me.
Why?
Well, with only seven, I'm not even sure we can get the sleigh off the ground.
translation.fr: Je ne sais pas si on pourra décoller avec sept rennes.

translation.en: I'm gonna need all the help I can get, Kate.
Hurry back.
[sighs] Work your magic, Mrs. Claus.
translation.fr: À toi de jouer, Mère Noël.

translation.en: -On, Dasher! On, uh, Dancer! -[reins crack]
On, Comet. On, Comet!
Uh, Vixen! [shouts in Elvish]
[Kate] Santa, what about all the presents you need to deliver?
translation.fr: Qu'en est-il des cadeaux à livrer ?

translation.en: Christmas is only three days away.
-Without Dasher, how are we-- -Like I said, it's a challenge.
translation.fr: - Sans Tornade, comment… - Comme je le disais, ça va être dur.

translation.en: But, you see, they're… they're improving.
As long as their Christmas Spirit stays high, we should be okay. [grunts]
translation.fr: Tant qu'ils gardent l'esprit de Noël, ça devrait aller.

translation.en: I'm so sorry, Santa. If I hadn't have just--
translation.fr: Désolée, Père Noël. Si je n'avais pas……

translation.en: Oh, no, no, no, no, no.
This is not your fault, Katie Cat.
translation.fr: Tu n'y es pour rien, Katimini.

translation.en: Believe me, that tricky little elf was gonna find his way
translation.fr: Crois-moi, ce lutin sournois aurait trouvé le moyen de rentrer au village.

translation.en: into the village one way or another.
translation.fr: ce lutin sournois aurait trouvé le moyen de rentrer au village.

translation.en: Well, what's he gonna do now?
Oh, he's probably trying to figure out some way to beat us to Turkey.
translation.fr: Il va sûrement essayer d'aller en Turquie avant nous.

translation.en: -But why? -Well, to stop me from getting a new star.
translation.fr: Pourquoi ? Pour m'empêcher d'avoir une étoile.

translation.en: That's not gonna happen.
Because he's not taking one thing into consideration.
What's that?
He can't possibly get there as fast as we can,
translation.fr: Il ne peut y arriver aussi vite que nous,

translation.en: no matter what he does.
You underestimate me, old man, just like you always do. [scoffs]
translation.fr: Tu me sous-estimes, vieille branche. Comme d'habitude.

translation.en: [sighs] We need to find a way to get the elves back to normal.
translation.fr: On doit ramener les lutins à la normale.

translation.en: [sighs] Okay. Now…
Elf, elf flu…
Elf-bin…
Here it is, Elf Bane.
-Oh, dear. -What?
It only has one known cure.
translation.fr: Il n'y a qu'un remède connu.

translation.en: -"Levande Root"? -[Mrs. Claus] It's a rare Arctic flower.
translation.fr: - La racine de Livonde. - C'est une fleur rare de l'Arctique.

translation.en: And there's only one place that it grows around here.
translation.fr: Et il n'y a qu'un seul endroit où elle pousse ici.

translation.en: Okay. Now, follow this path
translation.fr: Bien. Voilà. Suis ce chemin dans la forêt, il te mènera à la racine de Livonde.

translation.en: through the forest, and it will lead you to the Levande Root.
translation.fr: Suis ce chemin dans la forêt, il te mènera à la racine de Livonde.

translation.en: Okay, but you're coming with me, right?
translation.fr: OK, mais tu m'accompagnes. Pas vrai ?

translation.en: No, I need to stay here with Dasher.
translation.fr: Non, je dois rester avec Tornade.

translation.en: But, Mrs. Claus, isn't it kinda dangerous out there?
translation.fr: Mais, Mère Noël, c'est dangereux, non ?

translation.en: It can be, but that's true of any place.
translation.fr: C'est possible. Mais c'est vrai partout.

translation.en: You can do this, Jack. I won't let anything happen to you.
translation.fr: Tu y arriveras, Jack. Je te protégerai.

translation.en: I'll be watching you the entire time.
translation.fr: Je veillerai sur toi tout au long du voyage.

translation.en: And I'm arming you…
with these.
You're arming me with cookies?
Well, they're not just any old cookies.
translation.fr: Ce ne sont pas de simples biscuits.

translation.en: Okay, the gingerbread man cookie explodes when you throw it,
translation.fr: Écoute-moi bien. Celui en pain d'épices explose quand tu le jettes.

translation.en: and the snowman cookie gives you courage.
translation.fr: Et le bonhomme de neige te donne du courage.

translation.en: [sighs] Well, you have to move fast.
translation.fr: À présent, tu dois te dépêcher.

translation.en: We don't have a moment to lose.
translation.fr: On n'a pas une minute à perdre.

translation.en: Wait. Hold on.
-[Hugg shouts in Elvish] -My goodness.
You're never gonna get past those elves. [sighs]
Okay.
[in English] I just baked a whole batch of cookies!
translation.fr: J'ai fait un tas de biscuits.

translation.en: -[Hugg] Cookies? -Who's hungry?
[in English] That will distract them for about 30 seconds.
-Got it. -Now… there.
[exhales] Now's your chance, Jack.
[takes a deep breath] It's pretty cold out there. What if I get frostbite?
translation.fr: Il ne fait pas chaud. Et si j'ai des engelures ?

translation.en: Oh, don't worry about frostbite.
I'm an expert at reattaching fingers and toes.
translation.fr: Je sais recoudre les doigts et les orteils.

translation.en: -[Jack gasps] -Now, hurry.
Jack!
-[gentle orchestral music playing] -Be my hero.
My mom used to say the same thing to me. [sighs]
translation.fr: Ma mère me disait la même chose.

translation.en: Okay. It's hero time.
This is not what I expected Turkey to look like at all.
translation.fr: Je ne pensais pas que c'était comme ça la Turquie.

translation.en: Ah, you're on hallowed ground here, Kate.
translation.fr: Tu es en terre sacrée, Kate.

translation.en: You're about to witness something that no one else on earth
translation.fr: Tu vas voir quelque chose que personne d'autre sur Terre n'a jamais vu.

translation.en: has ever seen before.
translation.fr: que personne d'autre sur Terre n'a jamais vu.

translation.en: -[distant rustling] -What was that?
-Uh, Santa? -What?
You've been shot.
What?
Well, don't you feel anything?
Nah, riding around in the sleigh is like a shot of novocaine
translation.fr: Non, conduire un traîneau, c'est mieux qu'un anesthésiant dans les fesses.

translation.en: in the old butt cheek sometimes. [inhales sharply]
translation.fr: c'est mieux qu'un anesthésiant dans les fesses.

translation.en: [in English] You believe this guy?
[in English] Why don't they recognize you?
translation.fr: Pourquoi ils ne te reconnaissent pas ?

translation.en: Oh, they're just kids.
translation.fr: Ce ne sont que des gamins.

translation.en: Look at 'em.
Can't be more than-- What? Two, three hundred years old?
translation.fr: Ils doivent avoir à peine 200 ou 300 ans.

translation.en: They've never seen me. [chuckles]
I haven't been back here in,
translation.fr: Je ne suis pas venu depuis…

translation.en: oh, I don't know, maybe 500 years. [chuckles]
Five hundred and twenty-two, to be exact, Nicholas.
Hakan. [clicks tongue]
You look well and wise.
translation.fr: Tu as bonne mine. Et toujours aussi avisé.

translation.en: You as well, Nicholas.
Who's your friend?
[in English] Hmm. Your Elvish is impressive.
So is your English.
Thank you.
So, what brings you both here?
-Belsnickel. -Oh. What's he done now?
Destroyed the Christmas Star.
translation.fr: Il a détruit l'étoile de Noël.

translation.en: Well, we can build a new container.
translation.fr: On peut fabriquer un nouveau réceptacle.

translation.en: But only you, Nicholas,
can harness the power of the Star of Bethlehem.
translation.fr: peux maîtriser le pouvoir de l'Étoile de Bethléem.

translation.en: And as you know, the ritual is very dangerous.
translation.fr: Et comme tu le sais, le rituel est très dangereux.

translation.en: [Santa] We have no other choice.
We must move quickly.
[in English] That is really high.
Okay. Which one did she say gives you courage,
translation.fr: OK. Lequel donne du courage et lequel explose ?

translation.en: and which one explodes?
translation.fr: Lequel donne du courage et lequel explose ?

translation.en: I'm gonna go with the gingerbread man.
translation.fr: Je vais essayer le bonhomme en pain d'épice.

translation.en: No, no, it's the snowman…
translation.fr: Non, c'est le bonhomme de neige.

translation.en: I think.
I hope I don't blow up.
[exhales] All right, let's do this.
Thank you, Hakan.
Thank you, Santa Claus.
Now, hurry back to the North Pole.
Christmas must endure.
translation.fr: Le monde a besoin de Noël !

translation.en: Right, then, Kate. No time to lose. Hold on to this. [clears throat]
translation.fr: Pas une minute à perdre, Kate. Tiens ça.

translation.en: -[in English] Here, kitty, kitty. -[snarls]
Would you like a treat? [grunts]
-[footsteps fading] -That's right. You better run.
translation.fr: C'est ça. Tu as intérêt à courir.

translation.en: There's a new sheriff in town, and his name is Jack Booker.
translation.fr: Les choses vont changer par ici, foi de Jack Booker.

translation.en: Looks like the reindeer are doing a lot better.
You bet. Homeward bound!
[Santa] Holy jingle bells!
Ah, you really didn't think I was just gonna disappear, did you?
translation.fr: Tu ne pensais pas que j'allais disparaître ?

translation.en: -[high-pitched yipping] -What in the world is that?
It's my new ride.
-[Belsnickel's sleigh clatters] -Doesn't exactly scream aerodynamic.
What do you call those?
-[Belsnickel] It's my team of jackalotes. -[Santa] Jack-a-what?
translation.fr: C'est mon équipe de Chacalotes. Chac-a-quoi ?

translation.en: Jackal and coyote hybrid. My creation. Pretty cool, huh?
translation.fr: Un hybride de chacal et de coyote. Ma création. Génial, hein ?

translation.en: They're a long way from cool.
But you are clever, Belsnickel. I'll give you that.
translation.fr: J'admets que tu es malin, Belsnickel.

translation.en: Just not clever enough to beat me. [laughs]
translation.fr: Mais pas assez malin pour me battre.

translation.en: Wanna bet?
-[Santa grunts] -[Kate] Oh, no! The star!
-[Santa] Hold on tight! -[device whirring]
-[reindeer grunt] -[Santa] Come on, girls!
[Kate] Why did we stop? -What's going on? -I don't know.
There's something wrong with my instruments.
-[meter whirring] -[Santa] I gotta do something, fast.
We need to get that star back from Belsnickel!
translation.fr: On doit reprendre l'étoile à Belsnickel.

translation.en: Bon voyage!
Whoo-hoo! You feel that, everybody?
That's a world without Santa Claus.
translation.fr: C'est un monde sans Père Noël.

translation.en: -[sips] -That's my good girl. Drink it up.
-[Dasher panting] -Drink it up.
-Good girl. -[Dasher moans softly]
-[door slams] -[Jack] I made it!
-Never doubted you for a moment. -That makes one of us.
translation.fr: Je n'ai jamais douté de toi. Moi si.

translation.en: You think this'll work?
[inhales sharply] If it doesn't, we lose the elves forever.
translation.fr: Si ça ne marche pas, on perdra les lutins.

translation.en: Let's go.
-[wind whipping] -Where are we?
You mean, "When are we?" Look!
I think, somehow, we've gone back in time.
translation.fr: Je crois qu'on a remonté le temps.

translation.en: Back in time?
Wait a minute, Boston.
Logan International Airport, Christmas Eve.
translation.fr: Aéroport de Logan. La veille de Noël.

translation.en: It's not good.
Why not?
Well, during the holidays,
airports have some of the lowest Christmas Spirit in the world.
translation.fr: l'esprit de Noël est au plus bas dans les aéroports.

translation.en: Right now, this one's at…
…7% and dropping.
Well, what happens if Christmas Spirit gets down to zero?
translation.fr: Que se passe-t-il s'il tombe à zéro ?

translation.en: The reindeer won't be able to fly at all. Now, look at them. They're exhausted.
translation.fr: Les rennes ne pourront pas voler. Ils sont déjà épuisés.

translation.en: All right. Hold on tight. Okay, I'm gonna have to bring her down.
translation.fr: Accroche-toi. Je vais devoir descendre. Ça risque de secouer.

translation.en: Now, this… this might get a little rough.
translation.fr: Je vais devoir descendre. Ça risque de secouer.

translation.en: -Are they gonna be okay? -This is worse than I thought.
translation.fr: - Ça va aller ? - C'est pire que ce que je pensais.

translation.en: -[Santa] Oh, no. -What?
We just opened a tear in the fabric of time.
translation.fr: On vient d'ouvrir une brèche dans l'espace-temps.

translation.en: -Those wormholes won't stay open for long. -How much time do we have?
translation.fr: Ces vortex ne resteront pas ouverts longtemps. Combien de temps ?

translation.en: Uh, 11, 12 minutes, at the most.
Which means if we don't get Christmas Spirit up soon…
translation.fr: Si on ne ravive pas vite l'esprit de Noël…

translation.en: We're stuck here forever.
translation.fr: On est coincés ici pour toujours.

translation.en: Bingo! There's the guilty culprit, right here.
-What is it? -Ah, some kind of time twister.
translation.fr: - C'est quoi ? - Une sorte de chrono-tornade.

translation.en: Looks like Belsnickel figured out a rudimentary form of time travel.
translation.fr: Belsnickel semble avoir trouvé une façon de voyager dans le temps.

translation.en: -[chuckles] You gotta admire his work. -[buzzes]
But, as usual, it's also got his signature shoddy craftsmanship.
translation.fr: Mais comme d'habitude, on reconnaît son travail bâclé.

translation.en: [sighs] And looks like it's out of juice.
translation.fr: Et on dirait qu'il est déchargé.

translation.en: You need to find a power source for that.
translation.fr: Il faut trouver une source d'énergie.

translation.en: I need to get Christmas Spirit up and running again.
translation.fr: Je dois raviver l'esprit de Noël.

translation.en: [woman on PA] Attention, all passengers, TWA flight zero-seven
-Now, that's good, that's good. -[man on PA] Oh.
I think I found out what this thing runs on.
translation.fr: Je crois avoir trouvé avec quoi ça marche.

translation.en: Triple-A batteries.
Only Belsnickel could power a time machine with triple-As.
translation.fr: Il n'y a que lui pour alimenter une telle machine avec des piles AAA.

translation.en: All right, let's see what I've got here.
translation.fr: Voyons ce que nous avons là.

translation.en: [clears throat, sighs] Yeah. There we go.
-These are expired. -What?
[sighs] That's all I've got.
-The gift shop. They'll have some there. -Yeah. Good thinking. All right.
translation.fr: Il y en a à la boutique. Oui. Bien vu. Très bien.

translation.en: You go get 'em and then meet me right back here. All right?
translation.fr: Va les chercher et retrouve-moi ici. D'accord ?

translation.en: [sighs] All right.
Let's see what we have to play with here.
translation.fr: Voyons voir à quoi on a affaire.

translation.en: -[register whirring] -Three dollars, please.
Here you go. Keep the change.
-Is this some kind of joke? -[Kate] Hmm?
Is this Monopolymoney?
No, that's real.
[scoffs] This is the worst counterfeit job I've ever seen.
translation.fr: C'est la pire contrefaçon que j'ai jamais vue.

translation.en: -It says 2020. -Oh.
I bet they won't even be using paper money in 30 years.
translation.fr: Je parie qu'on utilisera plus de billets dans 30 ans.

translation.en: -Um, right. Um, my mistake. Sorry. -Hey, you gotta pay for those batteries.
translation.fr: Oui. Au temps pour moi. Désolée. Tu dois payer ces piles.

translation.en: What's goin' on here, young lady?
Where are your parents?
Oh, they're… they're cool with me traveling alone.
translation.fr: Ils sont… Ils me laissent voyager seule.

translation.en: Hmm. Can I see your boarding pass, please?
You know what? I must have dropped it over there. Uh, I'll go get it.
translation.fr: J'ai dû le laisser là-bas. Je vais le chercher.

translation.en: You know what? Hey! Why don't you come with me?
-What? No, please. -Look, kid, you got no ticket, no parents.
translation.fr: - Quoi ? Non. - Écoute, gamine… Tu n'as ni billet ni parents.

translation.en: -For all I know, you could be a runaway. -But I'm not a… Not exactly.
translation.fr: Tu fais peut-être une fugue. Mais non… Pas exactement.

translation.en: You know what? Just page Santa Claus. You'll see.
translation.fr: Appelez le Père Noël, vous verrez.

translation.en: Page Santa Claus. -Yeah, I'll get right on that. -[scoffs]
translation.fr: Appeler le Père Noël. C'est ça, je m'en occupe.

translation.en: -Okay. -[chimes jingle]
[gate agent] I'm sorry, everyone. I don't have good news.
All flights have been canceled!
What? Five minutes ago, you said there'd be a 30-minute delay.
translation.fr: Quoi ? Il y a cinq minutes, vous parliez d'un retard de 30 minutes.

translation.en: And now that flight has been canceled.
translation.fr: Et maintenant, ce vol a été annulé.

translation.en: So you're telling me you didn't know five minutes ago
translation.fr: Vous ignoriez, il y a cinq minutes,

translation.en: that it was a cancellation and not a delay?
I am telling you.
translation.fr: Je ne fais que vous expliquer.

translation.en: Listen, we can offer you a complimentary hotel room for the night.
translation.fr: Écoutez. On peut vous offrir une nuit d'hôtel.

translation.en: I don't want a free hotel room!
translation.fr: Je ne veux pas d'une nuit d'hôtel.

translation.en: I want a flight to Chicago, right now!
translation.fr: Je veux un vol pour Chicago, et tout de suite !

translation.en: -Time to go to work. -[chimes jingle]
♪ Now, wait a minute ♪
-[choir vocalizes] -Now, listen, brothers and sisters.
We ain't going nowhere
with all this negativity.
All this fussin' and fightin'
translation.fr: Toutes ces histoires et ces conflits

translation.en: ain't nothing but stupidity.
I've been listening to this noise and nonsense
translation.fr: J'ai écouté ce raffut et ces âneries

translation.en: all night and day.
Now, let's hear what the man with the plan has to say.
translation.fr: Cet homme a un plan, écoutons-le

translation.en: Go on, honey.
Tell them what it is we need.
Well, what we need is, uh…
Well, it's real simple.
All we need is, uh…
…the spirit of Christmas!
Perhaps I should explain a little further.
-[band playing] -♪ Well, you can look through any window ♪
♪ You see a great big beautiful world ♪
♪ There's an exciting adventure ♪
♪ Waiting for every boy and girl ♪
♪ But, Santa, life can be frustratin' ♪
translation.fr: Mais Père Noël, La vie peut être frustrante

translation.en: ♪ And very confusin' too ♪
♪ That's why When you see a bad mood comin' ♪
translation.fr: Alors, quand on sent que ça ne va pas

translation.en: ♪ You gotta catch it Right from the start ♪
♪ That's when you gotta stop thinkin' ♪
translation.fr: C'est là qu'il faut arrêter de penser

translation.en: -♪ And learn to trust your heart ♪ -[mouthing]
♪ You need the spirit of Christmas ♪ [laughs]
translation.fr: Il vous faut l'esprit de Noël

translation.en: ♪ The spirit of Christmas ♪
-♪ Tell it, Santa! ♪ -♪ Yeah, the spirit of Christmas ♪
translation.fr: - C'est ça, Père Noël ! - Oui, l'esprit de Noël

translation.en: -♪ Never goes away ♪ -[choir] ♪ Never goes away ♪
[both] ♪ The spirit of Christmas ♪
-♪ Spirit of Christmas ♪ -♪ The spirit of Christmas ♪
-♪ Spirit of Christmas ♪ -[both] ♪ The spirit of Christmas ♪
♪ Gonna save the day ♪
♪ Gonna save the day, sax! ♪
[chuckles softly] Hey, Grinch.
Don't look so down in the dumps. Christmas is tomorrow, after all.
translation.fr: Ne fais pas la tête. Noël, c'est demain.

translation.en: I wouldn't be so sure of that.
translation.fr: Je n'en suis pas si sûre.

translation.en: Sometimes, I just don't get people.
translation.fr: Je ne comprends pas les gens.

translation.en: A little snag in their plans, and suddenly, the sky is falling.
translation.fr: Un petit accroc dans leurs plans, et soudain, c'est le drame.

translation.en: Santa will find a way to make it all work out. He always does.
translation.fr: Le Père Noël va arranger ça. Comme toujours.

translation.en: For good little boys and girls.
I'm starting to wonder if I fall into the other category.
translation.fr: Je me demande si je ne fais pas partie de l'autre catégorie.

translation.en: [boy] Not a chance.
I know another True Believer when I see one.
translation.fr: Tu es une vraie croyante, c'est sûr.

translation.en: Wait, you know about True Believers?
translation.fr: Tu sais pour les vrais croyants ?

translation.en: I come from a long line of them.
translation.fr: Je suis issu d'une longue lignée.

translation.en: That's why I know that, by this time tomorrow, I'm gonna be in Miami.
translation.fr: C'est pour ça que je sais que demain, je serai à Miami.

translation.en: Nothing better than spending Christmas on the beach, if you ask me.
translation.fr: Rien de mieux que de passer Noël à la plage.

translation.en: Sounds like you'd get along with the rest of my family.
translation.fr: Tu t'entendrais bien avec ma famille.

translation.en: Christmas in the tropics just isn't for me. [sighs]
translation.fr: Noël sous les tropiques, ce n'est pas pour moi.

translation.en: Oh, don't get me wrong.
I love drinking hot cocoa by the fire, ice skating, all that good stuff.
translation.fr: J'adore le chocolat chaud près du feu, le patin à glace, tout ça.

translation.en: But my grandparents live in Florida, and they're too old to travel.
translation.fr: Mais mes grands-parents vivent en Floride et sont trop vieux pour voyager.

translation.en: And who knows how many more Christmases I'm gonna spend with them, you know?
translation.fr: Qui sait combien de Noëls il me reste avec eux. Tu comprends ?

translation.en: That's really sweet of you.
translation.fr: C'est très gentil de ta part.

translation.en: It's like my mom always says,
"Christmas isn't about where you are but who you're with."
translation.fr: "L’important c’est pas où on est à Noël, mais avec qui."

translation.en: -What's wrong? -Nothing. It's just…
[scoffs] I'm such a bad person.
Hey, it's okay. You couldn't have done anything that bad.
translation.fr: Tout va bien. Ça ne doit pas être si grave.

translation.en: Oh, I ran away and probably broke up my mom's engagement.
translation.fr: J'ai fait une fugue et sûrement rompu les fiançailles de ma mère.

translation.en: Okay, that's bad. [chuckles slightly]
But this guy your mom's with, he must be pretty horrible.
translation.fr: Mais le copain de ta mère. Il doit être horrible.

translation.en: No, Bob's a really great guy. And he makes her so happy.
translation.fr: Non, Bob est un type génial. Il la rend très heureuse.

translation.en: Okay. So now I'm really confused.
It's just, it's only been a couple years since my… my dad…
translation.fr: Ça ne fait que deux ans que mon père…

translation.en: And, well, if my mom marries Bob, then it means…
translation.fr: Et… si ma mère épouse Bob, ça signifie que…

translation.en: Your dad is really gone.
Yeah. Even though he's not here anymore,
translation.fr: Oui. Même s'il n'est plus là,

translation.en: it still feels like he's with us, you know?
translation.fr: j'ai l'impression qu'il est encore avec nous.

translation.en: And… I just really wanted to say goodbye to him.
translation.fr: Et… j'aurais voulu lui dire au revoir.

translation.en: And I guess I felt so sad about it,
translation.fr: Et ça m'a rendue si triste,

translation.en: I wanted everyone else to feel the same way I did.
translation.fr: je voulais que les autres aussi le soient.

translation.en: But the truth is, now,
I'd do anything to spend Christmas with them.
translation.fr: je donnerais tout pour passer Noël avec eux.

translation.en: Mom, Teddy, and, yeah, even Bob.
Well, we'll just have to make that happen, won't we?
-[Kate] How's it going? -Almost there.
translation.fr: Tu y arrives ? J'y suis presque.

translation.en: -[Kate] Hurry up. -[boy grunts]
Come on.
-What do you two think you're doin'? -[door squeaks]
Hey! Hey! No! Come back here!
Hey, wait!
♪ Everybody say, "yeah" ♪
-[choir, crowd] ♪ Yeah! ♪ -♪ Everybody say, "yeah" ♪
-♪ Yeah! ♪ -[Santa] ♪ Everybody say, "yeah" ♪
-♪ Everybody say, "yeah" ♪ -[crowd, choir] ♪ Yeah! ♪
♪ Sooner or later, you'll realize ♪
♪ You've got to believe in yourself ♪
♪ But you can't change the world alone ♪
translation.fr: Mais impossible de changer le monde seul

translation.en: ♪ Sometimes ♪ ♪ You need a little help ♪
-Showtime. -[Grace] ♪The spirit of Christmas ♪
-[crowd] ♪ Spirit of Christmas ♪ -[Grace] ♪ Spirit of Christmas ♪
-[crowd] ♪ Spirit of Christmas ♪ -[Grace] ♪ Spirit of Christmas ♪
-♪ Never goes away ♪ -[crowd] ♪ Never goes away ♪
[together] ♪ The spirit of Christmas ♪
♪ The spirit of Christmas ♪
♪ The spirit of Christmas Gonna save the day ♪
translation.fr: L'esprit de Noël, c'est ça la solution

translation.en: -♪ Gonna save the day ♪ -Sing it!
-♪ The spirit of Christmas ♪ -Yeah! [all] ♪ The spirit of Christmas ♪
-[Santa and Grace] ♪ It never goes away ♪ -[crowd] ♪ Never goes away ♪
[Santa and Grace] ♪ The spirit of Christmas ♪
-♪ The spirit of Christmas ♪ -[crowd] ♪ The spirit of Christmas ♪
[Santa and Grace] ♪ The spirit of Christmas ♪
♪ Gonna save ♪
♪ Yeah ♪
[all] ♪ Gonna save the day ♪
Well, look at that, everybody. You're all gonna be home for Christmas!
translation.fr: Regardez ça. Vous serez chez vous pour Noël.

translation.en: -[sighs] That was amazing. -Did you get 'em?
-[clears throat] -What?
The batteries.
Oh, yeah.
Ah, attagirl! Way to go, Kate.
Oh, yeah, Santa. I want you to meet someone.
translation.fr: Père Noël, je te présente quelqu'un.

translation.en: This is… I didn't get your name.
translation.fr: Voici… je ne connais pas ton prénom.

translation.en: It's Doug.
-Pierce. -[device whirs]
That's right. [chuckles]
Wait. Your name is Doug Pierce?
That's me, but how did you know my…
-Is he really Santa? -Just-- Wait. Okay.
You're Doug Pierce.
Are you from Lowell, Massachusetts?
Yeah, but I never told you where I was from.
translation.fr: Oui, mais je ne t'ai pas dit d'où je viens.

translation.en: -["O Christmas Tree" playing] -So, you're my…
You're my…
Santa, is he my… my…?
I hate to cut this short, kids, but we need to get going, Kate.
translation.fr: Désolé de vous couper, les enfants, mais on doit partir, Kate.

translation.en: [takes a deep breath] Time to say goodbye.
translation.fr: Il est temps de se quitter.

translation.en: [sighs] Goodbye, Dad.
Excuse me?
I mean, Doug.
Think you need to let Doug up for some air, Katie Cat.
translation.fr: Ne le serre pas trop fort, Katimini.

translation.en: Thank you for everything.
Yeah, well, a Pierce always sees it through.
translation.fr: Un Pierce va au bout de ce qu’il entreprend.

translation.en: [chuckles softly] Yes, we do.
Spoken like a True Believer.
translation.fr: Tu parles comme un vrai croyant.

translation.en: Kate!
Merry Christmas, Doug.
[Doug] Merry Christmas, Kate.
[sighs] And Merry Christmas, Santa!
[exhales] Note to self.
From now on, always bring a video camera wherever you go.
translation.fr: Toujours avoir une caméra sur soi.

translation.en: [Mrs. Claus] Now…
there's only one way to administer this to every elf.
translation.fr: il n'y a qu'un seul moyen de donner ça aux lutins.

translation.en: The cannons.
Exactly. Think you can do it?
I got this, Mrs. C.
Oh, Jack, I can't send you out there alone without protection.
translation.fr: Je ne peux pas t'y envoyer seul sans protection.

translation.en: More cookies?
No cookies are gonna stop thousands of maniacal elves.
translation.fr: Aucun biscuit n'arrêtera des milliers de lutins fous.

translation.en: Okay? So, follow me.
[sighs] You're gonna need something much stronger.
translation.fr: Il te faut quelque chose de plus fort.

translation.en: [chuckles] Look at them, 100% reenergized!
All right, ladies. This is our last chance to get back.
translation.fr: Bien, mesdames. Dernière chance de rentrer.

translation.en: But, Santa, when we do get back, how're we gonna get the star from Belsnickel?
translation.fr: Mais comment reprendrons-nous l'étoile des mains de Belsnickel ?

translation.en: I mean, he's probably already at the South Pole.
translation.fr: Il est sûrement déjà au Pôle Sud.

translation.en: Well, that's a very good point. Unless, of course, we set this little baby
translation.fr: C'est pertinent. Sauf, si, bien sûr, on règle ça

translation.en: to 15 seconds after Belsnickel sent us into the past.
translation.fr: quinze secondes après qu'on est retournés dans le passé.

translation.en: You'll see.
-Bon voyage! Whoo-hoo! -[wormhole whooshes]
You feel that, everybody? That's a world without Santa Claus.
translation.fr: Vous sentez ça ? C'est un monde sans Père Noël.

translation.en: [sighs] You really didn't think I was just gonna disappear, did you?
translation.fr: Tu ne pensais pas que j'allais disparaître ?

translation.en: This time, guard it with your life.
translation.fr: Cette fois, protège-la comme ta propre vie.

translation.en: On, Comet! On, Blitzen!
Hey! That wasn't very nice!
-Here we go! -[energy crackling]
-[in English] We're back! -We made it!
translation.fr: - On est rentrés ! - On a réussi !

translation.en: All right, there's the village square.
translation.fr: Regarde, c'est la place du village.

translation.en: When we get over the tree, you jump.
translation.fr: Quand on sera au-dessus de l'arbre, tu sauteras.

translation.en: -[jackalotes yip] -Jump? All the way down there?
You'll make it. I promise.
Here it comes. Get ready!
Get ready! Jump!
[in English] Now, coursers, on my command!
Okay, boys! Get ready to charge!
-Enough! -[bells ringing in slow motion]
[panting] Why'd you do that?
To put an end to this nonsense
translation.fr: Pour mettre fin à ces bêtises

translation.en: and stop the two of you from trying to destroy each other.
translation.fr: et vous empêcher de vous détruire.

translation.en: I was… I was… I was gonna veer off, at the very last second.
translation.fr: J'allais dévier à la dernière seconde.

translation.en: We were just playing a little game of chicken.
Exactly! Game of chicken.
-[chuckles] -Okay. All right, that's enough.
Nick, sometimes I think you actually enjoy these little dangerous escapades.
translation.fr: Nick, parfois, je me dis qu'en fait, tu aimes ces escapades périlleuses.

translation.en: [scoffs] Oh, don't be silly, I… I…
translation.fr: Ne dis pas de bêtises, je…

translation.en: Well, I… I… Eh.
-Oh, Dasher! You're all better now. -[Dasher grunts]
Thank you for saving my life. Oh! [kisses]
translation.fr: Merci de m'avoir sauvé la vie.

translation.en: Bad move, Yule Cat.
[sighs] Sayonara,Jola!
Dasher!
[chuckling] Oh, girl!
-[Mrs. Claus] Welcome back. -[control beeps]
[Santa] Welcome back, girl. You look great!
translation.fr: Content de te revoir. Tu as bonne mine.

translation.en: -[Mrs. Claus] She does, doesn't she? -[Santa] That was a perfect antler smash!
I knew you'd work a miracle.
-Thank you. -[Santa sighs]
Oh, no!
Just one shot left.
-[crossbow cocks] -You can do this. [sighs]
Thanks, Jack!
No problem, Kate!
-[in English] We did it! -[Jack] Yeah!
-[laughs] Attagirl, Kate! -Great job with the cannons, Jack.
translation.fr: Bravo, Kate ! Bien joué avec les canons, Jack.

translation.en: [panting] You may have won the battle, but you'll never win the war.
translation.fr: Vous avez gagné la bataille, mais pas la guerre.

translation.en: I'll find another way to get back in the village.
translation.fr: Je trouverai un moyen de revenir.

translation.en: I'll come back one day, and you'll all be in for the fight of your life.
translation.fr: Je reviendrai un jour et ce sera le combat de votre vie.

translation.en: I don't really think you mean that, Belsnickel.
translation.fr: Tu ne le penses pas, Belsnickel.

translation.en: But if you do, I'll be ready. [chuckles]
translation.fr: Dans tous les cas, je serais prêt.

translation.en: But, uh, until then…
there's something I want you to have.
translation.fr: je veux te donner quelque chose.

translation.en: -A little gift. -[Belsnickel] Let me guess.
Coal? You're so predictable.
translation.fr: Du charbon ? Tu es vraiment prévisible.

translation.en: The first toy…
that we built together.
You kept it?
[chuckling] Well, I kept working on it.
Helped remind me of what an amazing elf you are.
translation.fr: Ça m'a rappelé le lutin merveilleux que tu es.

translation.en: You mean, the elf I was.
He's still in there. You just need to believe it.
translation.fr: Il est encore là. Il suffit d'y croire.

translation.en: [sighs, voice breaking] We had some good times.
translation.fr: On a passé de bons moments.

translation.en: But I'll never be that elf again.
translation.fr: Mais je ne serai plus ce lutin.

translation.en: Of course you will.
[scoffs] Easy for you to say.
You don't know what this feels like.
translation.fr: Tu ne sais pas ce que je ressens.

translation.en: Belsnickel, you don't need to be an elf
to realize that running away doesn't solve all your problems.
translation.fr: pour comprendre que fuir ne résout rien.

translation.en: And sometimes,
we need to listen to the ones that we love the most.
translation.fr: on doit écouter ceux qu'on aime le plus.

translation.en: Because at the end of the day,
your family are the only ones in the whole world
translation.fr: les membres de ta famille sont les seuls

translation.en: who really understand you.
They're the only ones that will always be there for you, no matter what.
translation.fr: Ce sont les seuls qui seront toujours là pour toi.

translation.en: Someone really cool once told me
that Christmas isn't about where you are but who you're with.
translation.fr: Une personne géniale m'a dit : l’important c’est pas où on est à Noël, mais avec qui.

translation.en: We love you, Belsnickel.
Always have, Bels.
[sighs] I've always loved you guys.
I officially declare…
order has been restored to the North Pole!
translation.fr: le rétablissement de l'ordre au Pôle Nord !

translation.en: Now, Dasher, are you sure you're ready for this trip?
translation.fr: Tornade, tu te sens prête pour ce voyage ?

translation.en: If you say so.
All right. Last sleigh to Cancun.
-All aboard. -[Jack gasps] Oh, my God.
This is probably gonna be my first and only trip in the sleigh.
translation.fr: Ça va être mon premier et unique voyage en traîneau.

translation.en: -Can I sit up front, Santa? -Well, you can't drive from the back.
translation.fr: Je peux m'asseoir devant ? C'est mieux, pour conduire.

translation.en: -What? -[laughs] Yeah.
Now, this puppy's got some serious jump. You think you can handle it?
translation.fr: Ça secoue un peu. Tu t'en sens capable ?

translation.en: -Well, yeah! -All right. Jump in and get the reins.
translation.fr: - Oui ! - Très bien. Monte et prends les rênes.

translation.en: There you go. [grunts]
-Hey, Santa? -[Santa exhales]
I just wanted to say thank you.
For what?
For letting me say goodbye to my dad.
translation.fr: J'ai pu dire au revoir à mon père.

translation.en: Now, Kate, that was purely coincidental.
translation.fr: Tu sais, c'était une simple coïncidence.

translation.en: [chuckles] Yeah, right.
Jump in. [chuckles]
Children! Children!
[panting] In case you get a little peckish on the ride.
translation.fr: Au cas où vous auriez un petit creux.

translation.en: What's in these?
Um, eggs, butter, flour, sugar.
No. What kinda magic is in them?
I mean, when I ate one in the forest, I lost all my fears.
translation.fr: Quand j'en ai mangé dans la forêt, la peur m'a quitté.

translation.en: The snowman cookie made me feel stronger.
translation.fr: Le bonhomme de neige m'a donné de la force.

translation.en: Well, only the gingerbread man had magic ingredients.
translation.fr: Seul le bonhomme en pain d'épice était magique.

translation.en: The snowman didn't have any.
But wait.
So, that means…
The hero was always inside you.
translation.fr: Tu avais déjà la fibre d'un héros.

translation.en: [sighs] I'll never forget you, Mrs. Claus.
translation.fr: Je ne t'oublierai jamais, Mère Noël.

translation.en: Oh… you will from time to time, and that's as it should be.
translation.fr: Si, de temps en temps, et c'est normal.

translation.en: [sighs] Have a great journey.
-[both] Merry Christmas, Mrs. Claus. -Merry Christmas.
translation.fr: Joyeux Noël, Mère Noël. Joyeux Noël.

translation.en: -[grunts] Hey, guys. -[Kate] Yeah?
One last thing.
-[Jack] What's that? -Stay away from strangers in golf carts.
translation.fr: Quoi ? Méfiez-vous des inconnus en voiture de golf.

translation.en: -[all laugh] -Will do.
-[doors open] -[in English] Nick.
Hurry back.
-[chuckles softly] -Hit it, Jack!
Here goes. On, Dasher! On, Dancer! On, Prancer! On, Vixen!
translation.fr: Allez, Tornade, Danseur, Furie et Fringant !

translation.en: -[reins crack] -Goodbye, children!
[Santa] All right. Now pull 'em. Come on!
That's it. That's it. Now, pull 'em back! Pull 'em!
-[Jack shouting in Elvish] -Harder!
-[shouts in Elvish] -[laughing] Not bad. Not bad at all, Jack!
All right, kids. We're here.
Ready to jump?
Jump?
All the way down there?
-[Santa] Mm-hmm. -Trust me, Jack. You'll be fine.
I don't know, Kate. I fought a village of crazy elves,
translation.fr: Je ne sais pas. J'ai affronté des lutins en furie,

translation.en: but this seems kinda dangerous, if you ask me.
You'll be okay. I promise.
[sighs] Hey, Santa.
Yeah?
Will we ever see you again?
Not if he can help it.
We did it again.
Yes, we did.
Just one thing, Katie Cat.
I know, Santa. I'll be good.
-On, Dasher! -[Dasher grunts]
[shouting] Merry Christmas, Teddy!
You've gotta be kidding me.
Looks like you guys had a visit from our old friend.
translation.fr: Vous avez eu la visite de notre vieil ami.

translation.en: Was it as good as last time?
Well, let me put it this way.
I met Mrs. Claus, and I helped save Christmas with Dad when he was 13.
translation.fr: J'ai rencontré la Mère Noël et sauvé Noël avec papa quand il avait 13 ans.

translation.en: Are… Are you serio-- No way.
-Yes way. -[chuckles]
Yeah, well, I climbed a glacier and fought off a Yule cat,
translation.fr: Moi, j'ai escaladé un glacier et affronté un Chat de Noël.

translation.en: so I'm kind of a big deal at the North Pole now.
translation.fr: Donc, je suis connu au Pôle Nord maintenant.

translation.en: -Is that right? -[Jack] Yeah.
Me and Mrs. Claus are like this.
translation.fr: Moi et la Mère Noël, on est comme ça.

translation.en: Wow. You guys gotta tell me everything,
but Bob and Mom are actually waiting for us, so we gotta go.
translation.fr: mais Bob et Maman nous attendent, alors on doit y aller.

translation.en: Come on.
When I last saw you, you were heading to Kids Club.
translation.fr: Je vous ai laissés au club pour enfants.

translation.en: How'd you get from there onto Santa's sleigh?
You know, that was a life-changing trip.
translation.fr: Ce voyage a changé ma vie.

translation.en: -It was. -[Bob] Mm.
-[Claire chuckles] -Mm! Ah, there's my little man.
-[Jack] Dad! -Come on! What?
-I'm so happy to see you, honey! -[Bob] That's my main man!
translation.fr: - Contente de te voir ! - C'est mon garçon !

translation.en: -Ah, I missed you so much! -Yeah!
-I missed you, too. -[Claire sighs]
Both of you.
-Really? -Ah.
Yeah.
Kate, I want you to know I really care for your mother.
translation.fr: Kate, je veux que tu saches que je tiens à ta mère.

translation.en: And I hope that me and you can continue to bond.
translation.fr: J'ai hâte d'apprendre à mieux te connaître.

translation.en: I know nothing happens overnight.
translation.fr: Ça n'arrivera pas du jour au lendemain.

translation.en: One day at a time, right?
translation.fr: On prendra le temps. Pas vrai ?

translation.en: One day at a time.
You know, guys, I was thinking, maybe tonight…
translation.fr: Je me disais que ce soir, on pourrait chanter des chants de Noël.

translation.en: maybe we should have a caroling party.
translation.fr: que ce soir, on pourrait chanter des chants de Noël.

translation.en: -[softly] Wow! -Seriously?
Sure.
I… I think that's a great idea.
-I love it. I'm in. -[Claire] Let's do it.
[Bob] So, what song should we sing?
How about "O Christmas Tree"?
♪ O Christmas Tree, O Christmas Tree ♪
translation.fr: Mon beau sapin, roi des forêts,

[both] ♪ O Christmas Tree, O Christmas Tree ♪
translation.fr: Mon beau sapin, roi des forêts,

translation.en: ♪ How lovely are your branches ♪

[all] ♪ O Christmas Tree O Christmas Tree ♪
translation.fr: Mon beau sapin, roi des forêts,

translation.en: ♪ How lovely are your branches ♪
[elves and Clauses] ♪ O Christmas Tree, O Christmas Tree ♪
translation.fr: Mon beau sapin, roi des forêts,

♪ O Christmas Tree, O Christmas Tree ♪

translation.en: ♪ Much pleasure do you bring me ♪
♪ For every year, this Christmas tree ♪

translation.en: ♪ Brings to us much joy and glee ♪
translation.fr: Et tes bonbons et tes joujoux

translation.en: -[elf] Mwah! -[all] ♪ O Christmas Tree ♪ ♪ O Christmas Tree ♪
translation.fr: Mon beau sapin, roi des forêts,

translation.en: -♪ Much pleasure do you bring me ♪ -[cannons blasting]
[elves] ♪ O Christmas Tree, O Christmas Tree ♪
translation.fr: Mon beau sapin, tes verts sommets,

♪ O Christmas Tree ♪ [elves, Bookers, and Pierces] ♪ O Christmas Tree ♪
translation.fr: Mon beau sapin, tes verts sommets,

translation.en: ♪ We learn from all your beauty ♪
♪ Your bright green leaves With festive cheer ♪
translation.fr: De la foi qui ne ment jamais,

translation.en: ♪ Give hope and strength ♪ ♪ Throughout the year ♪
translation.fr: De la constance et de la paix

translation.en: -[laughing] Merry Christmas! -[lollipop crunches]
Merry Christmas, Mina!
[all together] ♪ O Christmas Tree ♪ ♪ O Christmas Tree ♪
translation.fr: Mon beau sapin, tes verts sommets,

♪ Your beauty ♪
